businesses.name: Outrigger Pizza Co
businesses.description: Hawaii's first mobile wood-fired pizza, featured on Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives. Chef-owner Kevin Laut has been crafting artisan pizzas from his custom-built trailer since 2009, using handmade dough and sauces cooked in an authentic Italian clay oven.
businesses.signature: The Lilikoi Pork Pizza - passion fruit glaze, sweet peppers, mozzarella & pulled pork

businesses.name: 808 Deli
businesses.description: Two-time winner of 'Best Sandwich in Maui' by Maui Time Weekly. This beloved Kihei deli serves generous portions of handcrafted sandwiches, fresh salads, and their famous banana pudding. Now in a spacious new location at Rainbow Mall with indoor seating.
businesses.signature: The Belly Dancer - savory pork belly sandwich with all the fixings

businesses.name: Aqua Adventures
businesses.description: Family-owned Molokini snorkel tours on a fast 50-foot boat with an all-local crew. Departs Ma'alaea Harbor at 7:15am for two snorkel locations: Molokini Crater and Turtle Arches. Limited to 36 guests for a more personal experience.
businesses.signature: Two-location snorkel tour with continental breakfast, deli lunch, and open bar
businesses.hours: Daily departure 7:15 AM from Ma'alaea Harbor
